content: *amigurumi guy is a super fun critter lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70594ad published in jo-ann knit 1 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 4 colors 1 ball each *purple pea green white brick* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 1 plastic safety eye 9 mm diameter 1 plastic safety eye 12 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish similar pattern 80735ad rudy the rectangle 1 is worked in 5 colors with crocheted eyes 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rudy-the-rectangle
